channel.title: Java compiler for your server
channel.description:
Note: I am currently working on a new feature for the tool and uploading files and download to my site. [center][size=40pt][b]JSM Java Compiler V1.1[/b][/size][/center] [center]JSM Java compiler is a program by Jordan Moore. It has been created for 32-bit windows machines with JDK installed.[/center] [center]100% Free, it's only a simple app. No trials or limitations, capabilities are limited currently.[/center]
[u][b]So what does this program do?[/b][/u] This program basically just makes compiling java source files easy and quick. The way it manages this has now been changed, upon compiling it generates a quick 3 line batch file based on the data fed to it. It then runs this to compile and removes the batch file afterwards. (So you can see errors).
[u][b]Features[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Compiles java source files[/li] [li]Easy to use[/li] [li]Automatically finds where the JDK is, no matter what version[/li] [li]Automatically sets source path to where program is ran from[/li] [li]Can change source path[/li] [li]Very small file size[/li] [li]Fast load time[/li] [li]Standalone (no install needed)[/li] [li]1 file, just delete that file to remove (no traces, not even in registry)[/li] [li]Virus free[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Features in development?[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Generate your servers own multi-purpose batch file[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Credits?[/b][/u] You do not have to include me in the credits because this has nothing to do with the server or your work, it just makes compiling easier.
[u][b]You must agree to these terms before you use it[/b][/u] [code] 1)You must not claim this as your own work. 2)You must not ever sell this for a cost. 3)You must not reverse engineer it in any way. 4)You must not remove my name from the program itself (you may rename application). 5)If you are distributing it you must credit me, you must also only distribute the files this program needs - nothing else. [/code]
[u][b]Screenshot[/b][/u] [img]http://allaboutguitar.site40.net/mopar/JSMscreenshot%20%281%29.jpg[/img]
[u][b]I know its not a server - here is a virus scan (make sure to also scan it yourself)[/b][/u] [img]http://allaboutguitar.site40.net/mopar/JSMscreenshot%20%282%29.jpg[/img] [center][size=30pt][u][b]DOWNLOAD HERE;[/b][/u][/size][/center] [center][url=http://allaboutguitar.site40.net/mopar/JSM Java Compiler.zip]http://allaboutguitar.site40.net/mopar/JSM Java Compiler.zip[/url][/center]

item.title: Java compiler for your server
item.dc:creator: @jordanmoore jordanmoore
item.description:
@jordanmoore wrote:

Yes it would be a smaller size, this is basically a no-effort compiler.

Many time when you download a source or open source application you have to spend time editing their compilers to fit your JDK, with this you simply drag it to the folder, run and press compile.

But I understand Batch Compilers are more customisable and better overall for a server.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jordanmoore wrote:

Note: I am currently working on a new feature for the tool and uploading files and download to my site.
[center][size=40pt]JSM Java Compiler V1.1[/size][/center]
[center]JSM Java compiler is a program by Jordan Moore. It has been created for 32-bit windows machines with JDK installed.[/center]
[center]100% Free, itâ€™s only a simple app. No trials or limitations, capabilities are limited currently.[/center]

So what does this program do?
This program basically just makes compiling java source files easy and quick.
The way it manages this has now been changed, upon compiling it generates a quick 3 line batch file based on the data fed to it. It then runs this to compile and removes the batch file afterwards. (So you can see errors).

Features

[ul][li]Compiles java source files[/li]
[li]Easy to use[/li]
[li]Automatically finds where the JDK is, no matter what version[/li]
[li]Automatically sets source path to where program is ran from[/li]
[li]Can change source path[/li]
[li]Very small file size[/li]
[li]Fast load time[/li]
[li]Standalone (no install needed)[/li]
[li]1 file, just delete that file to remove (no traces, not even in registry)[/li]
[li]Virus free[/li][/ul]

Features in development?

[ul][li]Generate your servers own multi-purpose batch file[/li][/ul]

Credits?
You do not have to include me in the credits because this has nothing to do with the server or your work, it just makes compiling easier.

You must agree to these terms before you use it

1)You must not claim this as your own work.
2)You must not ever sell this for a cost.
